confirm_replaceDetail: Before performing the replacement, please make sure the document has been backed up. Also, please note that no operations should be performed during the replacement process.
error_noPicgoAttr: No information written by the PicGo plugin was found in the document. It may not have been uploaded to the image bed.
success_replace:
Replacement successful. 
Found ${assetsCount} local images in the document and replaced ${replaceCount} of them.
success_partial_replace:
Partial replacement successful. 
Found ${assetsCount} local images in the document and replaced ${replaceCount} of them.
fail_replace:
Replacement failed. 
Found ${assetsCount} local images in the document and replaced ${replaceCount} of them.
confirm_replaceOnline_detail: No local images were found in the document. Clicking confirm will search for and replace online images. Replacing online images requires traversing all blocks in the document, so once again, please do not edit the document during the replacement process.
setting_dblclickShowSubDoc_desp: 启用双击展开子层级功能；启用后将插件将代为处理文档树单击、双击事件，如出现文档树打不开文档、不显示菜单等问题，请停用插件并向开发者反馈
setting_dblclickDelay_desp: 单位：毫秒；注意，小于150毫秒几乎无法判定为双击
setting_experimental: (Experimental Feature. UNSTABLE. May be removed at any time)
error_initFailed: Double-click-file-tree (File tree enhance) Plugin initialization failed, please report this issue to developer at your convenience
